data.title: Griselda on Netflix cast: Who stars alongside Modern Family's Sofia Vergara?
data.meta_description: Griselda will be making its Netflix debut this week so who stars alongside Modern Family's Sofia Vergara?
data.text:
Watch the official trailer for Griselda

Griselda on Netflix has almost arrived so along with actress Sofia Vergara, who else is in the cast?

Inspired by a true story, Griselda tells the true story of a businesswoman and mother who was behind creating one of the most profitable drug cartels in history.

Earning herself the name “The Godmother”, Griselda is described as a “lethal blend of savagery and charm”, who was at her peak during the 1970s and 1980s in Miami.

Taking on the titular role is actress Sofia Vergara who is best known for her starring as the hilarious Gloria Delgado-Pritchett for 11 seasons.

More recently, she has been a judge on America’s Got Talent and voiced characters in the films Koati and Strays.

Read more: Sofia Vergara jokes she’d ‘kill ex-husband’ as she spills on Manganiello split

Who stars in Griselda on Netflix with Sofia Vergara?

June - Juliana Aiden Martinez

While Griselda is making her mark in the drug world, June is doing so in the world of policing as the first female intelligence analyst in the Miami PD.

When Griselda’s case is put forward to her, June is determined to put a stop to the cartel’s violent crimes.

Actress Julianna Aiden Martinez has had roles in shows such as The Mysteries of Laura, Prodigal Son and The Blacklist.

Carmen - Vanessa Ferlito

NCIS fans will best recognise Vanessa Ferlito for playing Tammy Gregoria in CBS’ cancelled spin-off NCIS: New Orleans.

She has also been Detective Aiden Burn in CSI: NY, Claudia Hernandez in 24 and FBI Agent Charlie DeMarco in Graceland.

Ferlito is behind Carmen who works with Griselda in her former trafficking circle but is looking to stay away from her new Miami operations.

Carla - Karol G (also known as Carolina Giraldo)

Karol G’s biggest role to date has been as Yeimy Montoya in the Colombian telenovela The Queen of Flow for two seasons.

In Griselda, she is behind Carla, a young woman who becomes one of her most trusted employees.

DON'T MISS...

Sofia Vergara reveals health battle as she stars in brand new Netflix series [HEALTH]

Sofia Vergara teases she's keen to stay in New York for 'more options with men' [CAST]

Sofia Vergara on learning how to ‘smoke and do cocaine’ for Netflix's Griselda [EXPLAINER]

Dario - Alberto Guerra

Dario is given the job of finding Griselda and bringing her back to Colombia but ends up falling in love with her.

Actor Alberto Guerra has been in both Narcos and Narcos: Mexico, as well as other series like El Señor de los Cielos and El Refugio.

Amilcar - Jose Zuniga

Actor Jose Zuniga is behind Amilcar, a “sophisticated” Miami cartel boss who has plenty of connections in the local drug scene.

Zuniga has been in Madam Secretary, American Crime Story, Snowfall and Westworld.

Dixon - Orlando Pineda

Taking on the role of Griselda’s loyal eldest son Dixon is actor Orlando Pineda who has been in The Infiltrators and Narcos: Mexico.

Invalid email

Arturo Mesa - Christian Tappan

Arturo Mesa is Griselda’s trusted accountant from Medelin who moves his life to Miami to help her with the business.

Actor Christian Tappan has also featured in Primate, The Five Juanas, It Was Always Me and The Great Heist.

Alberto - Alberto Ammann

Alberto plays a crucial role in Griselda’s journey, not only as her ex-husband but as the man who introduced her to cocaine.

He is best remembered for playing leader of the Cali cartel in Narcos and Narcos: Mexico on Netflix.

Other cast members include:

'Rivi' - Martin Rodriguez

Rafa - Camilo Jimenez Varon

Isabel - Paulina Davila

Uber - Jose Velazquez

Ozzy - Martin Fajardo

Griselda debuts on Thursday, January 25, on Netflix.
